mapper.update: update t_user set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobilephone = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, selfintroduction = #{selfintroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, headimg = #{headimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createdate = #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select uid, account, password, sex, birthday, age, email, mobilephone, selfintroduction, headimg, idcard, createdate, status from t_user where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select uid, account, password, sex, birthday, age, email, mobilephone, selfintroduction, headimg, idcard, createdate, status from t_user
